description:
Keep your bike looking and riding in tip-top shape. This kit contains the essentials to clean and protect your bike and components.

  • Includes 1L Nano Tech cleaner, 500ml Drivetrain cleaner, 50ml Bio-Dry Lube, 400ml MO-94 spray on protectant, 2-pronged wheel and Component brush, and an expanding micro cell sponge
  • Eco-friendly formulas are fully biodegradable
  • MO-94 sheds water and grime and adds a protective layer to frame and components
  • Includes storage tote
name: Muc-Off Bike Care Essentials Kit
